cards.name: DAU
cards.query: SELECT countDistinct(playerId) AS dau FROM game_event WHERE ts >= today() - 1

cards.name: MAU
cards.query: SELECT countDistinct(playerId) AS mau FROM game_event WHERE ts >= addMonths(today(), -1)

cards.name: Rake Curve
cards.query: SELECT toDate(ts) AS day, sum(rake) AS rake FROM wallet_commit GROUP BY day ORDER BY day

cards.name: VPIP/PFR
cards.query: SELECT v.stake, v.vpip, p.pfr FROM stake_vpip v JOIN stake_pfr p USING (stake) ORDER BY v.stake
